Sniper/Rhinox


Sniper looks around in the war room. "Uhhh.... I hear that we are 
going to fight somebody. When we get started, and are there any hills 
near by??? Because I might need to Sniper a few people."


Rhinox, in the war room, sit in a chair, he looks around. "Battle 
ehhhh, against who???" Rhinox polishes his chain guns. Rhinox thinks 
to himself, 'maybe my two chain guns won't do'. "Hey, do any-of-you 
now if there is a wepon locker on this ship so that I can borrow 
some."
